youtube.credentials_file: Path to your YouTube credentials file (e.g., C:/path/to/your/client_secret.json)

newsapi.country: Country code (e.g., us) see Api doc
newsapi.category: business entertainment general health science sports technology
newsapi.page_size: Number of articles to fetch per request (e.g., 5)

currentsapi.country: Country code (e.g., us) see Api doc
currentsapi.category: business entertainment general health science sports technology
currentsapi.page_size: Number of articles to fetch per request (e.g., 5)

article_settings.model: The GPT model to use (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4)

video_result.background_music: Path to background music file (e.g., C:/path/to/your/music.mp3)
